item.description: The State of Indian Economy https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/the-economy-story-is-unravelling-just-46-days-into-fy22-101621203348452.html The recent surge in COVID-19 cases has also manged to crush the economic recovery hopes. Although there hasn’t been a three-month national lockdown, there are local lockdowns almost everywhere in the country. Google Mobility Data Google LLC “Google COVID-19 Community Mobility Reports”. https://www.google.com/covid19/mobility/ Accessed: May 17, 2021. https://www.gstatic.com/covid19/mobility/2021-05-13_IN_Mobility_Report_en-GB.pdf The workplace mobility has fallen sharply (by about 54%) since its peak in March 2021.1 Retail and recreation related mobility is down by a whopping 63%.
